timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
if (currentPartQuantity > bestPartQuantity) {
return part;
} else if (currentPartArmor > bestPartArmor) {
return part;
}
if ((currentPartQuantity > bestPartQuantity) || (currentPartArmor > bestPartArmor)) {
return part;
}
